dc_title_s: Carte de la Barbarie, de la Nigritie et de la Guinée; par Guillaume de l'Isle.
dc_description_s: Charles Inselin engraver. Relief shown pictorially. Prime meridian: Ferro. Probably a later version than 1707 as the printing plate seems to have been altered near the statement of publisher in lower right of map. 1 map: hand col.; 47 x 59 cm This map is in the public domain. Please attribute access and use of this digitized map to the Stephen S. Clark Library, University of Michigan Library.
